name: Fifteen Minute Macaroni & Salmon Salad
author: JOSLYN H.
summary: This tasty macaroni salad recipe gets you out of the kitchen fast! Couldn't be easier - just dump salmon, peas, and onions in a large bowl, and mix with mayonnaise and seasoning. Equally as delicious with canned chicken or tuna.
ingredients: 10 ½ ounces canned peas and pearl onions, drained
2 (7 ounce) cans skinless, boneless salmon, drained and flaked
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook macaroni for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain and rinse under cold water until cool
In a large bowl, mix together macaroni, peas and onions, salmon, and mayonnaise
Season with onion powder, salt, and pepper, and mix well
Cover, and refrigerate 2 hours, or until well-chilled
